dictionary.title: The Chemistry Development Kit Dictionary
dictionary.description: This dictionary describes terminology used on CDK classes and configuration files. The items are listed in alphabetical order.

entry.description: For each isotope the abundance is given as a percentage, and the sum of all these abundances is 100%.

entry.definition: The exact sum of bond orders that this atom type can have.
Denotes the geometrical orientation of the atom with respect to it's bonded neighbors.
entry.description: Accepted values are: sp1, sp2 and sp3. See the CDKConstants class.

entry.definition: The maximal bond order that this atom type can have.

entry.description: The major isotope has abundance 100 by default, and the other isotopes have abundances relative to the major one.
The amount of isotope of one element compared with the amounts of the other isotopes of that element in a natural mixture of isotopes.
